Lines: We'll be guarding Gau taking on cargo.
Itsa job anyone could do.
Well, let's take it easy today.
Its a bit boring to just stand around...
Don't let your guard down.
I'm sure Federation is planning something big.
Certainly, based on recent federal troop movements
our next mission area is also in danger zone.
Are you sure it will be safe?
Klaus.
Don't say things that will worry Anne.
You are too nervous you know.
Hmph.I don't want to be unprepared when the time comes.
If you don't have inenr strength to prepare and overcome,
you won't survive long in this war.
Oy Klaus. Its a good point,
but there's no need to scare us up.
H-hey g-guys...
please don't fight...
Hey, we're not fighting!
Right, Klaus?
Ah, yes.
Its ok, we'll be fine.
No matter what happens,
I'll do my best to help you.
Hahahaha! That's reassuring.
Oh? I guess its almost time.
Well then. Brauer's Squad, get ready to sortie.
Roger that!
